bibl.title: Idion and idiotikon ploion.
bibl.note: Although in most instances an ἴδιον πλοῖον will no doubt have been the property of the naukleros, it can not be excluded that in some cases it is in fact a private boat, belonging to a different person.
bibl.seg: CLARYSSE Willy, Idion and idiotikon ploion.

Although in most instances an ἴδιον πλοῖον will no doubt have been the property of the naukleros, it can not be excluded that in some cases it is in fact a private boat, belonging to a different person.
